vpn_selection.headline: Thematic Analysis of Consumer VPN Selection Preferences
vpn_selection.summary: This analysis explores key themes related to consumer preferences when selecting VPN services, highlighting essential features, concerns, and motivations.

themes.title: Privacy and Security
themes.description: Participants prioritize features that enhance their online privacy and security, including data encryption, no-logs policies, and identity protection.

quotes.quote: No logs policy and multiple servers across multiple locations.
To make sure my private connection is safe and also not to be tracked online.
Identity protection.

themes.title: Performance and Reliability
themes.description: Participants emphasize the importance of speed, reliability, and server availability in their VPN selection process.

quotes.quote: Security.
I consider the speed of the vpn and the locations available to me.
Fast speeds and a reliable connection are the two most important features I look for when choosing a VPN.

themes.title: Cost and Value
themes.description: Participants express concerns about the cost of VPN services and seek affordable options that provide good value for their needs.

quotes.quote: The price and the security benefits offered.
Whether or not the VPN service also tracks my activity, price.
Fast speeds, and good value for fast performance.

themes.title: Ease of Use and Accessibility
themes.description: Participants highlight the importance of user-friendly interfaces and the ability to easily access desired content.

quotes.quote: I consider the available locations as well as security parameters the vpn might possess to protect my information.
User-friendly interface and features If the VPN is easy to use and if it offers additional features like split tunneling and ad-blocking.
The most important thing is keeping my location private to anyone.

classifications.response: not in US or EU data protection/retention policies
No logs policy and multiple servers across multiple locations.
I really wanted to protect my identity without having my information stolen.
The speed of the internet, and security is the most fundamental aspect of the digital internet that we can access
Security.
To make sure my private connection is safe and also not to be tracked online.
I want to make sure I’m completely safe online and not be tracked to have my activity and purchases monitored.
what and where I can access different countries streaming
Having it protect my information but at the same time letting me do everything I need to do without restraint.
The amount of privacy protection it provides that I can proudly trust.
The features to be able to protect my identity.
I use what is recommended by my security service.
reputation, cost, reliability, other users opinions
Privacy and convenience.
I want a good anonymous browser session.
price of product and level of security
I want it to be very reliable and secure. It must be top quality.
I am looking for an effective, secure VPN.
Privacy.
Costs, locations, ease of use and quality.
I consider the available locations as well as security parameters the vpn might possess to protect my information.

unmet_needs_private_location.headline: Thematic Analysis of Consumer Perspectives on Private VPN Endpoints
unmet_needs_private_location.summary: This analysis explores consumer attitudes towards the feature of setting up private server locations in VPN services, highlighting perceived benefits and drawbacks.

themes.title: Security and Privacy Concerns
themes.description: Participants express a strong desire for enhanced security and privacy when using VPN services, particularly regarding personal locations.

quotes.quote: It's very important because I need to be safe.
I like a private area protected from hackers.
The benefit is that it gives me added protection.

themes.title: Convenience and Accessibility
themes.description: Many participants appreciate the convenience and accessibility that personal server locations provide, especially for remote work or travel.

quotes.quote: Yes I can access the VPN from anywhere and it will be available on any devices.
I think it is convenient. you never know where you need to work from.
It is very appealing because it makes a safer security net.

themes.title: Technical Limitations and Concerns
themes.description: Participants express concerns about potential technical issues, such as slower speeds or connection drops when using personal locations.

quotes.quote: Sometimes VPN will block me from accessing some sites I may want to visit.
Slower speed compared to if the VPN was not in use.
Connection dropping.

themes.title: Perceived Value and Usefulness
themes.description: Participants recognize the potential value of personal server locations for enhancing privacy and control over their data.

quotes.quote: Benefits are I don't have to share a server or location point.
It provides a stronger sense of security.
It helps me get connections to locations where my internet router has trouble reaching.

themes.title: Concerns About Doxxing and Privacy Risks
themes.description: Some participants express concerns about the risks of doxxing and privacy exposure when using personal locations.

quotes.quote: I don’t want my home exposed as there could be potential dangers associated with it.
Drawbacks are the risk of doxxing and swatting.
People could potentially track down someone.

classifications.response: Not appealing
assigned_themes: Concerns About Doxxing and Privacy Risks

classifications.response: Not very. To me, that is a gimmick.

current_vpn_feedback.headline: Thematic Analysis of Consumer Feedback on VPN Features
current_vpn_feedback.summary: This analysis explores consumer feedback regarding desired features in VPN services, highlighting key themes around satisfaction, performance, and security needs.

themes.title: Satisfaction with Current Features
themes.description: Many participants express contentment with their current VPN services, indicating no additional features are needed.

quotes.quote: No
No, not at all
None that I can think of at this moment

themes.title: Desire for Enhanced Security
themes.description: Participants express a need for improved security features to protect against hacking and data breaches.

quotes.quote: Just added security of no hacking since that’s becoming part of the 'norm' nowadays
protects privacy from hackers on the internet to help you stay safe
Access to more secured servers

themes.title: Performance Improvements Requested
themes.description: Some participants highlight the need for better performance, including faster speeds and more server locations.

quotes.quote: Speeding up server time better
More bandwidth, more server locations
faster service

themes.title: Interest in Additional Features
themes.description: A subset of participants expresses interest in additional features that could enhance their VPN experience.

quotes.quote: I wish they kind of assigned you a personal rep.
Perhaps cheaper rates, faster and more reliable service, and even more accessibility to media outside my area
The ability to use it seamlessly on my phone.

themes.title: Uncertainty About Needs
themes.description: Several participants are unsure about what additional features they might want, indicating a lack of awareness of potential improvements.

quotes.quote: Not sure
i cant think of any
None that come to mind.

classifications.response: No
No
No, not at all
Not sure
Just more secure
Speeding up server time better
None that I know of.
I wish it offered more options in terms of countries I could connect to.
no there isn't
Working for every website without limitation.
No
Not applicable
No. Nothing I can think of
No, I cannot think of any I wish Bitdefender's VPN had.
No, have everything I need.
I can’t think of anything
no suggestions
I can't think of anything.
speed!
None
None that I can think of at this moment
Multiple locations with very fast connections. I need options that are equally viable

i can't really say that there's anything that i'm looking for if something comes to mind would be more than happy to let you know but at this present time no there's not anything else that i'm looking for for my vpn server to do for me
I think it is positive and affordable at this way, maybe I could try another features to improve performance.
No
Not that I can think of
None
None
Not sure
I wish they. Kind of assigned you a personal rep.So that you can develop some sort of relationship with them
None
are there any specific capabilities or features that you wish your current VPN service provider offered but it doesn't at present?
CAN'T THINK OF ANY.
As from now I don't know exactly but I recommend them to keep upgrading their services
NA
I can't think of any
No
Nothing comes to mind
No it’s what i expected.
N/A
higher speeds
I really haven’t thought about it
Nothing comes to mind. The service meets my expectations.
VPN for me to use on my phone.
Not that I can think of right now.
None
There are not any capabilities/features that I wish my current VPN service provider offered that it doesn't today.
More bandwidth, more server locations
None that I can think of.
Not really.
No additional features that I feel are needed with my employers VPN service.
No
Nothing I can think of right now
It’s the capabilities I don’t know about that interests me if that makes sense
I am satisfied with Norton capabilities
Showing an estimated live location of the IP I'm using
The service could be bundled with more cybersecurity features. They could feature lower prices as well.
I don’t want anything too complicated but it would be nice to have some way to know if my connection or security has been compromised
None that come to mind.
Access to more secured servers
The ability to use it seamlessly on my phone. it is pretty cumbersome t use on my phone currently.
unreliable performance
None
Not that I know of
That's insightful! Given this background, are there any capabilities or features that you wish your current VPN service provider, Windscribe, offered but it doesn’t today?
Not that I can think of
no
Not that I can think of
No
Not yet
no
No
no
It has all features
I don't think of any

You mentioned seeing a benefit in a flawless digital privacy and security solution. In line with that, are there any capabilities or features that you wish your current VPN service provider offered that it doesn’t offer today?
no
none
never wish for any other features
faster service
no
No

it is a bit slow and like i mentioned earlier it is very lacking in servers in other countries so those two it increased the speed a it but like i also said the speed isn't the most important thing i am willing to give up speed for quality you know in safety and you know so it its speed is important but it's also lower on my list of and things i want but definitely wanting more servers that something i would like
More robust and easy to use features on other devices
No every thing is good
Personal Wifi.
Perhaps cheaper rates, faster and more reliable service, and even more accessibility to media outside my area
There aren’t really more capabilities that I can think of to be honest. All of these is the one that I want.

I think I have all the tools that I need from NordVPN and Opera GX
that's very positive to hear. Now, is there anything particular that you wish your current VPN, Avast, offered that it does not offer today?
no

No, I can’t think of anything.
protects privacy from hackers on the internet to help you stay safe

not necessarily no

remove_data_steps_probe_yes.headline: Thematic Analysis of Consumer Privacy Market Insights
remove_data_steps_probe_yes.summary: This analysis explores key themes from consumer responses regarding data deletion motivations and experiences, highlighting the importance of privacy, security concerns, and satisfaction with data deletion processes.

themes.title: Privacy Concerns
themes.description: Participants express a strong desire to protect their personal information from unauthorized access and tracking.

quotes.quote: Because I don't want nobody knowing my identity.
I want less information about me available to the public.
Just rather my data not be out there and vulnerable.

themes.title: Security Motivations
themes.description: Many participants cite experiences with hacking, identity theft, or data breaches as primary motivators for pursuing data deletion.

quotes.quote: ID theft tears ago.
The ability to secure and make sure my data is safe.
Fraud on my bank account.

themes.title: Satisfaction with Data Deletion Processes
themes.description: Participants report varying levels of satisfaction with the data deletion processes, often expressing uncertainty about the effectiveness of their actions.

quotes.quote: No. It’s cumbersome.
Well, not the best but it’ll have to make do.
I hope that I've made it more difficult for anybody who wants it to get it.

themes.title: Desire for Control
themes.description: Participants emphasize the need for control over their personal data and the importance of managing their digital footprint.

quotes.quote: I felt it was a good idea. You can't be too careful these days.
Just don’t keep history.
Just dont need all my data out there.

themes.title: Frustration with Current Solutions
themes.description: Participants express frustration with the effectiveness and transparency of current data deletion services.

quotes.quote: Just ok still not totally secure.
It could be a LOT simpler and more transparent.
It's hard to gauge - sometimes I live in a nebulous fear.

classifications.response: do not leave data all over the place
ID theft tears ago
Because I don't want nobody knowing my identity.
Being hacked
I locked my Facebook page
No. It’s cumbersome.
I don’t want my personal information to be used to open up potential lines of financial gain.
I knew the sites I visited were being tracked and cookies put on my computer
Too many ti.es you can get spam messages such as emails from certain things and it's so annoying.
The ability to secure and make sure my data is safe
Didn't trust the site
I don’t want anymore information out there than necessary
When they shared my info with other sites without my knowledge or permission.
I felt it was a good idea. You can't be too careful these days.
I want less information about me available to the public
Don’t want random people having personal information
I don't like my information to be available and I don't like being tracked
The need to have less digital footprint

i want to let of shows on on tv as far as netflix and stuff like that with data breaches and all kinds of stuff so i mean it's a it's a pretty scary world that we're living in and the best protection is keep the vpn in place so that secure my my granddaughter secure and the rest of my family is secure because i mean god forbid if anything should happened with and unsecured computer system

For more security that's all.

Websites that I no longer use having my information. Or I am doing things like blocking the tracking and refusing third party cookies.
I want the least amount of my information out in the world, which includes not being on any social media sites.
Fraud on my bank account.
The things that lead me to make the decision to delete my personal data from websites/online databases are to have more privacy and fewer spam texts, emails, and/or calls.
Make my social media private
Googling myself. Information is available that I never made available to the general public. I have no idea how, when, or why it wound up on the net.

Data leaks from those websites.
I want to make sure that sensitive information isn’t saved for future use
To be anonymous in my daily use of the Internet

for security purposes

remove_data_steps_probe_no.headline: Thematic Analysis of Consumer Interest in Data Removal Services
remove_data_steps_probe_no.summary: This analysis explores consumer attitudes towards removing personal information from online databases, highlighting varying levels of interest, concerns about participation in online communities, and considerations of cost and convenience.

themes.title: Interest in Data Removal Services
themes.description: Participants express varying degrees of interest in utilizing services to remove personal information from online databases.

quotes.quote: Yes
yes
Yes.

themes.title: Concerns About Participation
themes.description: Some participants worry that removing their personal information may impact their involvement in online communities or activities.

quotes.quote: I'm concerned removing this information might affect that participation.
Maybe but I don't know how to do it and not sure how much it would cost.

themes.title: Cost and Convenience Considerations
themes.description: Participants frequently mention the importance of cost and ease of use when considering data removal services.

quotes.quote: Possibly depending if it costs more
It would depend on the cost and the steps required to remove my personal information.
not interested

themes.title: Lack of Interest or Knowledge
themes.description: A significant number of participants express disinterest or lack of knowledge regarding data removal services.

quotes.quote: No
no
no interested
